comments:
Noticed this problem when opening the attached file. It throws exceptions in the
log when loading from cache.

Created an attachment (id=20642)
File cache load causes exceptions

Load this file to generate cache. Close the editor and open again to see the
exceptions.

Wrapped exception
org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: Character conversion error: "Illegal ASCII
character, 0xd7" (line number may be too low).

Changed released to HEAD. Problem was that we wrote the cache using ASCII
encoding. The Japanese characters were not ASCII. Changed to use UTF-8 encoding,
so now they read/write correctly.

traces.message: Character conversion error: "Illegal ASCII character, 0xd7" (line number may be too low).
